snippet.title: The Tribe Must Survive: Early Access Release Announcement
snippet.description:
The Tribe Must Survive is a unique take on the strategy survival genre. Lead your tribe through hardship, disasters and lovecraftian horror into a brighter future or see it fall and try again.
The game releases on Steam in Early Access on the 22nd of February 2024. Wishlist now!

Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1729940/The_Tribe_Must_Survive/
https://twitter.com/TTMSGame
https://www.tiktok.com/@thetribemustsurvive
